tool.name: Differential expression analysis

param.name: edger_dispersion
param.label: edgeR dispersion value
param.help: Read edgeR manual to guide your value choice

param.name: rots_b
param.label: number of bootstraps and permutation resampling

param.name: min_rowSum_counts
param.label: Minimum count
param.help: Only those rows of matrix meeting requirement will be tested

param.name: reference_sample
param.label: Name of a sample to which all other samples should be compared
param.help: default is doing all pairwise-comparisons among samples

param.name: contrasts
param.label: Pairs of sample comparisons to perform
param.help: A 2-column tabular with lists of pairs of samples to compare

tool.help:
Trinity_ assembles transcript sequences from Illumina RNA-Seq data. This tool performs differential expression analyses on a transcriptome assembled with Trinity.
**Inputs**
This tool uses the matrix produced by 'Build expression matrix for a de novo assembly of RNA-Seq data by Trinity' tool.
You must describe your samples and replicates with a tabular file looking like this:
=========== ================ ConditionA CondA_replicate1 ----------- ---------------- ConditionA CondA_replicate2 ----------- ---------------- ConditionB CondB_replicate1 ----------- ---------------- ConditionB CondB_replicate2 ----------- ---------------- ConditionC CondC_replicate1 ----------- ---------------- ConditionC CondC_replicate2 ----------- ---------------- ConditionC CondC_replicate3 =========== ================
It will probably be the same file as used in the tool 'RNASeq samples quality check for transcript quantification'. The names in column 2 must match the names given in the tool 'Build expression matrix for a de novo assembly of RNA-Seq data by Trinity'.
.. _Trinity: http://trinityrnaseq.github.io
